org.midao.jdbc.core.utils

Class MidaoUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.midao.jdbc.core.utils.MidaoUtils
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class MidaoUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Group of helper utilities used within Midao Majority of JavaDocs were copied from DbUtils as it is very close copy of DbUtils

    This class is Deprecated - please use MjdbcUtils instead

      • loadDriver

        public static boolean loadDriver(java.lang.String driverClassName)
        Deprecated. 
        Loads and registers a database driver class. If this succeeds, it returns true, else it returns false.
        Parameters:
        driverClassName - of driver to load
        Returns:
        boolean true if the driver was found, otherwise false

      • loadDriver

        public static boolean loadDriver(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader,
                                 java.lang.String driverClassName)
        Deprecated. 
        Loads and registers a database driver class. If this succeeds, it returns true, else it returns false.
        Parameters:
        classLoader - the class loader used to load the driver class
        driverClassName - of driver to load
        Returns:
        boolean true if the driver was found, otherwise false

      • rollback

        public static void rollback(java.sql.Connection conn)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Deprecated. 
        Rollback any changes made on the given connection.
        Parameters:
        conn - Connection to rollback. A null value is legal.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs

      • rollbackAndClose

        public static void rollbackAndClose(java.sql.Connection conn)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Deprecated. 
        Performs a rollback on the Connection then closes it, avoid closing if null.
        Parameters:
        conn - Connection to rollback. A null value is legal.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs
        Since:
